Package com.mathgame.math

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Calculate
    The Calculate class calculates the result of combining two cards
    CompMover
    The CompMover class is the adapter class used for moving components such as the JLabels around on the screen.
    MathGame
    The main class of the program
    ScoringSystem
    The ScoringSystem class keeps track of the score
    SoundManager
    The SoundManager class is responsible for the sound effects and volume control of the Math Game
    TypeManager
    The TypeManager handles the different types of games and converts between values of different types
    Window
    The Window class is where execution of the Math Game begins.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MathGame.GameState  
    SoundManager.SoundType  
    TypeManager.Difficulty  
    TypeManager.GameType
